info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 12:24PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Idaho and northwestern Ravalli Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1223 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Darby, or 23 miles south of Hamilton, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Darby, Victor, Woodside, Pinesdale, Grantsdale, Bell Crossing, Charlos Heights, Corvallis and Como. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 27 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
